#summary Upgrading to v4

* Portable Mushclient
 * Save the following files
  * In your Mushclient dir
    * Aardwolf.db and Aardwolf_bookmarks.db if you use the GMCP_Mapper already
  * In worlds/Aardwolf
    * Aardwolf.MCL

 * Copy the zip over your current install
 * Copy the Aardwolf.db and Aardwolf_bookmarks.db back into your Mushclient dir
 * In Aardwolf.MCL
  * Copy the aliases/triggers/macros from the saved Aardwolf.MCL into the new Aardwolf.MCL
 * Start Mushclient
 * Load any 3rd party plugins you use
